arts.ttl: Brazil place Man City's Pep Guardiola on 'three-man managerial shortlist' following Dorival Junior dismissal
arts.sum: Brazil are reportedly considering Pep Guardiola as a potential target after placing the Manchester City boss a three-man managerial shortlist.

arts.ttl: Brazil sack head coach Dorival Junior after humiliating defeat to Argentina
arts.sum: Brazil succumbed to a humiliating 4-1 loss to arch-rivals Argentina on Wednesday

arts.ttl: Brazil sack Dorival Junior as manager in 'talks' after Argentina defeat in World Cup qualifier
arts.sum: Brazil confirm that manager Dorival Junior is no longer the national team manager, with talks reportedly taking place with his successor.

arts.ttl: Brazil confirm Dorival Junior sacking after heavy Argentina defeat as replacement is lined up
arts.sum: The 4-1 loss to rivals Argentina proved to be the final straw for Dorival Junior as Brazil boss

arts.ttl: Brazil are 'on the brink' of sacking Dorival Junior after suffering humiliating 4-1 defeat by Argentina as former Chelsea boss is lined up for role
arts.sum: Brazil are set to sack head coach Dorival Junior after the five-time world champions' embarrassing 4-1 defeat by Argentina, according to reports from South America.

arts.ttl: Brazil set to sack Dorival Junior with immediate effect
arts.sum: Brazil are set to sack head coach Dorival Junior with immediate effect after the nation’s 4-1 defeat to Argentina. Brazil’s difficult World Cup qualification campaign continued during March’s international break. The five-time world champions beat Colombia in Brasilia, before a heavy loss to Argentina in Buenos Aires. The 4-1 defeat to their arch-rivals leaves Brazil […] The post Brazil set to sack Dorival Junior with immediate effect first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Why Real Madrid's Kylian Mbappe, Vinicius Junior Could be Banned From UCL Quarterfinals vs. Arsenal
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé, Vinícius Júnior and Antonio Rüdiger are under investigation by UEFA and could be banned for the Champions League quarterfinals.
